Citation.sTitle: Solubilities of Sulfadiazine, Sulfamethazine, Sulfadimethoxine, Sulfamethoxydiazine, Sulfamonomethoxine, Sulfamethoxazole, and Sulfachloropyrazine in Water from (298.15 to 333.15) K
Citation.sAbstract: Using a static equilibrium method, the solubilities of sulfadiazine, sulfamethazine, sulfadimethoxine, sulfamethoxydiazine, sulfamonomethoxine, sulfamethoxazole, and sulfachloropyrazine in water have been determined experimentally from (298.15 to 333.15) K. The experimental data were correlated with the modified Apelblat equation. The calculated results show good agreement with the experimental data.

PropRepeatability.eRepeatMethod: Standard deviation of a single value (unbiased)
